languages.text: "Как пожелаешь. Не знаю, чем прогневал тебя, но спорить не буду. Прощай, {name}. Чутье подсказывает, что всех нас ждет суровое ненастье. Встреть его доблестно, а я продолжу свою охоту в одиночку".
"As you wish. I do not know what I did to anger you, but I will not argue. Farewell, {name}. My gut tells me we're all in for some foul weather. Meet it valiantly. I will continue my hunt alone."
languages.original_text: "Как пожелаешь. Не знаю, чем прогневал тебя, но спорить не буду. Прощай, {name}. Чутье подсказывает, что всех нас ждет суровое ненастье. Встреть его доблестно, а я продолжу свою охоту в одиночку".

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As you wish. I do not know what I did to anger you, but I will not argue. Farewell, {name}. My gut tells me we're all in for some foul weather. Meet it valiantly. I will continue my hunt alone."

traits.locale_text: "As you wish. I do not know what I did to anger you, but I will not argue. Farewell, {name}. My gut tells me we're all in for some foul weather. Meet it valiantly. I will continue my hunt alone."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “如你所愿。我不知道我哪里惹怒了你，但我并不打算进行争辩。就此别过吧，{name}。我的直觉告诉我，我们都将迎来可怕的暴风，勇敢地面对它吧。至于我，我要继续独自狩猎了。”
languages.original_text: "As you wish. I do not know what I did to anger you, but I will not argue. Farewell, {name}. My gut tells me we're all in for some foul weather. Meet it valiantly. I will continue my hunt alone."

traits.locale_text: “如你所愿。我不知道我哪里惹怒了你，但我并不打算进行争辩。就此别过吧，{name}。我的直觉告诉我，我们都将迎来可怕的暴风，勇敢地面对它吧。至于我，我要继续独自狩猎了。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Como quiera. No sé qué he hecho para enfadarle, pero no lo discutiré. Adiós, {name}. Mi instinto me dice que se acerca el mal tiempo. Hágale frente con valor. Seguiré mi cacería en solitario».
languages.original_text: "As you wish. I do not know what I did to anger you, but I will not argue. Farewell, {name}. My gut tells me we're all in for some foul weather. Meet it valiantly. I will continue my hunt alone."

traits.locale_text: «Como quiera. No sé qué he hecho para enfadarle, pero no lo discutiré. Adiós, {name}. Mi instinto me dice que se acerca el mal tiempo. Hágale frente con valor. Seguiré mi cacería en solitario».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「お望みのままに。お前を怒らせるようなことをしたのかわからんが、反論するつもりはない。じゃあな、{name}。俺の直感じゃあ、悪天候が続く。勇敢に立ち向かえ。俺は一人で狩りを続ける」
languages.original_text: "As you wish. I do not know what I did to anger you, but I will not argue. Farewell, {name}. My gut tells me we're all in for some foul weather. Meet it valiantly. I will continue my hunt alone."

traits.locale_text: 「お望みのままに。お前を怒らせるようなことをしたのかわからんが、反論するつもりはない。じゃあな、{name}。俺の直感じゃあ、悪天候が続く。勇敢に立ち向かえ。俺は一人で狩りを続ける」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht. Ich weiß nicht, wodurch ich Euch verärgert habe, doch ich werde nicht widersprechen. Lebt wohl, {name}. Mein Bauchgefühl sagt mir, dass uns allen schlechtes Wetter bevorsteht. Begegnet ihm tapfer. Ich werde meine Jagd allein fortsetzen."
languages.original_text: "As you wish. I do not know what I did to anger you, but I will not argue. Farewell, {name}. My gut tells me we're all in for some foul weather. Meet it valiantly. I will continue my hunt alone."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht. Ich weiß nicht, wodurch ich Euch verärgert habe, doch ich werde nicht widersprechen. Lebt wohl, {name}. Mein Bauchgefühl sagt mir, dass uns allen schlechtes Wetter bevorsteht. Begegnet ihm tapfer. Ich werde meine Jagd allein fortsetzen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Comme vous le souhaitez. Je ne sais pas en quoi je vous ai {mf|contrarié|contrariée}, mais je ne discuterai pas. Adieu, {name}. Je sens jusque dans mes tripes qu'une grave tempête s'annonce. Affrontez-la avec courage. Je poursuivrai ma chasse seul. »
languages.original_text: "As you wish. I do not know what I did to anger you, but I will not argue. Farewell, {name}. My gut tells me we're all in for some foul weather. Meet it valiantly. I will continue my hunt alone."

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous le souhaitez. Je ne sais pas en quoi je vous ai {mf|contrarié|contrariée}, mais je ne discuterai pas. Adieu, {name}. Je sens jusque dans mes tripes qu'une grave tempête s'annonce. Affrontez-la avec courage. Je poursuivrai ma chasse seul. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "As you wish. I do not know what I did to anger you, but I will not argue. Farewell, . My gut tells me we're all in for some foul weather. Meet it valiantly. I will continue my hunt alone."

languages.text: "Nasıl istersen. Seni sinirlendirmek için ne yaptım bilmiyorum ama tartışmaya gerek yok. Elveda {name}. İçimden bir ses, havanın kötüleşeceğini söylüyor. Olacaklarla cesurca baş edesin. Ben avıma tek başıma devam edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "As you wish. I do not know what I did to anger you, but I will not argue. Farewell, {name}. My gut tells me we're all in for some foul weather. Meet it valiantly. I will continue my hunt alone."

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl istersen. Seni sinirlendirmek için ne yaptım bilmiyorum ama tartışmaya gerek yok. Elveda {name}. İçimden bir ses, kötü hava şartlarının yaklaştığını söylüyor. Cesurca baş etmelisin. Avıma tek başıma devam edeceğim."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
